scripts.db:reset: dropdb bookstore_development; createdb bookstore_development; psql bookstore_development < src/models/db/schema/schema.sql; psql bookstore_development < src/models/db/schema/load-data.sql
scripts.test:db:reset: dropdb bookstore_test; createdb bookstore_test; psql bookstore_test < src/models/db/schema/schema.sql; psql bookstore_test < src/models/db/schema/load-data.sql
